query.value: SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Y.N_IDX = ? ORDER BY Y.N_RIDX DESC, X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER , (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , ( SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE (N_OWNER_IDX = ? OR C_DOMAIN_YN='Y') AND C_DEL_YN='N' GROUP BY N_LIST) B WHERE A.N_LIST = B.N_LIST UNION SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , ( SELECT E.N_IDX AS N_TASK_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK E, ( SELECT D.N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER C, TIMECLOUD_TASK D WHERE (C.N_TASK_IDX=D.N_IDX) AND C.N_OWNER_IDX = ? GROUP BY D.N_LIST ) F WHERE E.N_LIST = F.N_LIST ) B WHERE A.N_IDX = B.N_TASK_IDX ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX=Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM as ro FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX = X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER, Y.C_STATUS, ( SYSDATE - TO_DATE (X.V_REG_DATETIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))AS GAP, FN_TIMEGAP(X.V_REG_DATETIME) AS TIMEGAP, Y.C_DOMAIN_YN FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS, A.C_DOMAIN_YN FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, (SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE (N_OWNER_IDX = ? OR C_DOMAIN_YN='Y') GROUP BY N_LIST) B WHERE A.N_LIST = B.N_LIST UNION SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS, A.C_DOMAIN_YN FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, (SELECT E.N_IDX AS N_TASK_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK E,(SELECT D.N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER C, TIMECLOUD_TASK D WHERE (C.N_TASK_IDX = D.N_IDX) AND C.N_OWNER_IDX = ? GROUP BY D.N_LIST) F WHERE E.N_LIST = F.N_LIST) B WHERE A.N_IDX = B.N_TASK_IDX ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' ) $0$ ORDER BY N_IDX DESC )Z ) $1$ -- WHERE ro BETWEEN ? AND ?

query.value: SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Y.N_OWNER_IDX=? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX, X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, ( SELECT A.V_DESC, A.N_IDX, A.N_OWNER_IDX, A.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_TASK B WHERE (A.N_PARENT_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_LEVEL > 0 AND B.N_OWNER_IDX = ? ) Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX=Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER ,Y.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y, TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER Z WHERE (X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND Y.N_IDX = Z.N_TASK_IDX) AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Z.N_OWNER_IDX=? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.N_OWNER_IDX,X.N_TASK_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.V_REG_DATETIME, Y.V_DESC AS V_TASK_DESC, Y.N_OWNER_IDX AS N_TASK_OWNER, (SELECT V_NAME FROM TIMECLOUD_USER WHERE N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX) AS V_FEEDBACK_OWNER FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X, TIMECLOUD_TASK Y WHERE X.N_TASK_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.C_DEL_YN = 'N' AND Y.N_LIST=? ORDER BY Y.N_RIDX ASC, X.N_IDX ASC
INSERT INTO TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK( N_IDX, V_DESC, N_OWNER_IDX, N_TASK_IDX, V_REG_DATETIME, N_DOMAIN_IDX ) VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), ? )
SELECT N_IDX, N_OWNER_IDX, N_TASK_IDX, V_DESC, V_REG_DATETIME FROM TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK X WHERE N_IDX = ? AND C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY N_IDX ASC
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_FEEDBACK SET C_DEL_YN='Y' WHERE N_IDX=? AND N_OWNER_IDX=?
